name: GRAMIN VIKAS PARISHAD PATHALGAON
briefDescription: Gramin vikas parishad, pathalgaon, district jashpur is registered under societies registration act 1973, registration number is 54 dated 06-08-1991. It was felt that there is a necessity to raise the standards of tribal and village people of Raigarh, Madhyapradesh so that they can benefit from the government programes and be self reliant and lead a progressive life. Because of this the organization was formed in 1991. During the past 18 years after the formation of Chhattisgarh state Thousands of people have benefitted under the Govt programmes in health, education,agriculture in the districts Jashpur, Raigarh, Sarguja, Koriya, korba, Janjgir, Bilaspur, Raipur, Durg etc. The organization is also interested to work in other technical fields
